content.detailedDescription: As we were driving home from the store i saw a light in the sky that looked like something on fire. we watched it and as we pulled into the driveway another one appeared. my daughter and i watched as approximately 8 to 10 total of these craft passed overhead. they were all following the exact same path and they all disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Saw multiple craft that looked like they were on fire.

content.detailedDescription: On the 30th of october in roberts, idaho i walked outside of my house which is a few streets from the city hall of roberts. i looked up in the sky and saw a glow next to a cloud. i kept looking at it thinking it could be a balloon, plan, or even a star. however, the more i looked at it it gave a gleaming of chrome probably from the reflexion from the sun. i quickly grabbed  my friend from inside the house, and he said "it's a star" . however, at the time the incident happen there were no other stars around the object. the object hovered in the same position for the time we saw and took pictures of it. the clouds moved but the object remain fixed and motion less. we had to go to work and we stopped looking at the object, but once we picked up our third coworker and mentioned the incident to him he pointed out he also saw the same object in the sky. we had no specific feelings towards the incident and no side effects from it.
content.summary: A chrome like circular object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My roommate and i were driving home on christmas eve between 9:30 and 10:30 pm and i noticed two orange/red lights in the sky and asked if she saw them and she confirmed and we pulled over in awe. we both tried to take pics and video with our iphone 5's but we both realized our picture option on both our phones were facing us and we didn't realize this until we looked at the video i attempted to record and the pics she tried to take were of us basically saying oh my god and do you really see this over and over again. 
the two orbs of light hung in the sky/hovered over a building. it was difficult to tell how close or far away they were. it seemed as if they were within 500 feet but i could be wrong. it looked as if the two lights were on an object that i felt was dark black with asymmetrical edges but i can't be sure. i know what i saw, but still am second guessing myself because i want my depiction to be accurate and factual.  the light on the left facing started to slowly fade out and then it looked as though the object was moving at us and the right facing light began to ascend and then it was gone completely. 
we have both been back to the location individually since and there is absolutely nothing in the sky above this building. no street lamps or anything else this could have been. not quite sure what we saw but it was definitely an unidentified flying object. and it has changed my life. i have felt many emotions ranging from excitement and joy to dread and fear. we both feel that we shouldn't tell too many people about our experience because of the narrow minded mentality of some people. this is out of character for me, considering i am a very public person and i have been researching alien life forms and ufo's for the past five years and even put on a successful art show two years ago 333 bending time. i feel because of my connection with and passion and curiosity about this subject makes me seem less credible. i have often wondered why i felt so connected with other worldly entities and objects but have never physically seen one. i am thankful my roommate was with me to document this event.
content.summary: Two burnt sienna lights in sky hovering on a difficult to make out solid object

content.detailedDescription: At about 5 minutes before midnight on new years eve 2014 i stepped outside to listen to the annual neighborhood racket as the midnight hour approached. at about 12:04 am, as the sound of firecrackers and distant hollering subsided, i noticed a bright pinkish orange ball of light approaching from the east. it drifted closer, and i watched it through some nearby trees across the street, possibly as close as 80 yards, when it turned in a northerly direction and drifted out of sight. about a minute later, a second identical ball of light came from exactly the same direction and turned north at the same spot. i ran inside and grabbed my dvd video recorder and got a good view of the second object zoomed in, but in my haste, did not have the damned record button pushed in! zoomed in, the object had the outline of one of those old style milk bottles as it drifter north. not a solid, evenly distributed light, but an outline of pinkish light (sketch included). i observed it through the camera lens for about a minute and a half. i thought the first one must be some type of chinese lantern until it changed direction from an easterly path to a northerly one. i do not know how an object being carried along by the wind could do that. the objects were completely silent. on july 4, 2013 at around 10:00 pm i witnessed a flotilla of these same orbs of light, about 13 or 14 in number, drift across the delaware river toward phila. intl. airport. saw 5 more in the nearby town of mantua back in early summer 2014. they drifted over my car as i was driving home from k mart. i pulled over to get a better look as they drifted about 100 feet or so above me. as if this is not enough, last new years eve i, along with numerous people in the neighborhood witnessed a flotilla of these things drifting and hovering about a hundred feet or so off the ground. my sighting from last new years eve also happened at a few  minutes after midnight. others in the neighborhood saw the orbs several hours before midnight. i am perplexed as to what is going on, and would like to know if others witnessed these things last night as well. thanks for you time, and keep up the good work. i enjoy your spots on the jeff rense show very much.  [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Saw 2 pink/orange orbs about 12:04 am new years eve. both came  from east and turned north.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting at home and the wife went out to smoke a cigarette and came back in and hollered at me to come out side. i went outside and observed about a dozen bright orange objects coming up over the horizon flying in formation the moving about iradically, and the they would change to a white color and the disappear.
content.summary: Lights were observed coming up over horizon as bright orange balls flying in a formation then changed tgo a white color and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was eight years old at the time and was playing in my room. at that time my brothers were in their room at the backside of the house. my brothers called out to me and my mom that a bright light was approaching our house. we lived near o'hara airport so this wasn't unusual but it was the direction of the light that bothered my older brothers. once i reached their room i could see out the back window a very bright light coming towards us from over the tree tops. the light coming towards us had the effect of blacking out the lights below it as it moved forward. my mom had practiced crash drills as we were close to the airport on a routine basis. we all moved to the center hallway and ducked down near the walls. at that moment all our lights were on and the tv and radio as well. when the object moved directly over our house all the electricity when out at the same time. it was at that precise moment that i broke free from my mothers arms and raced to the living room french windows. i remember with extreme detail that the curtains were blown up to the ceiling as i looked up to see the circular shaped craft roar above our house. it had multi colored lights on its bottom side and moved with frictionless speed across the sky in a straight path. the lights on the bottom of the craft were large window like portals that glowed around the edges. its movement was like a boat going across the water but leaving no ripples as it moved. it continued straight forward as it cleared the space above our house until it changed course and shot straight up into space and was gone. it took only two seconds for it to go from flying straight forward to flying straight up into space. i remember clearly seeing the bottom of that craft as it shot upwards into space as it was circular and not spinning or vibrating in any manner. the image was burned into my mind until this very day. that moment changed my life in so many ways. i was diagnosed not too long after that with colored blindness in blue green and grey colors. i was reading at a college level and was put into gifted and talented program by ten years of age. i also began to have weird experiences throughout the years of being watched. also developed a lot of psychic abilities since i was eight years old.
content.summary: Saucer roared over my house when i was a kid.Witnessed saucer move over my house then shoot up into space and was gone seconds later

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were in middle school and at high school football game. we decided to leave early and sneak a smoke. we walked a couple of blocks and went behind a video store. we both layed flat on our back in the grass as we smoked,looking up at the stars. it was night time and the sky was clear as could be. you could see every star in the sky. i saw a plane high in the sky flying a straight path and had a blinking red light. we have at least 3 small airports in 3 different states within about a 10 mile radius from us. i watched the plane for a few seconds then i started looking straight above me at the stars. all of a sudden i saw a light that i thought was a star start moving fast across the sky,i thought " cool, a shooting star" it moved fast, in a straight line several feet across the sky which in reality was probably a couple miles in reality because it was so high above us. well it moved several feet across the sky in a second or less, and all of a sudden it stopped. it stayed in one position for a second or 2 and then it instantly moved the same distance and speed across the sky again but this time in a different direction, then it stopped again and stayed still for a second or 2 and took off again but in a different direction this time again. it did this 4 or 5 times. it moved, stop, rested for a second or 2 then took off in a different direction each time, it reminded me of a pin ball, but instead of continually moving as it changed directions it stopped for a second or 2 before it changed directions. after 4or 5 times it stopped, then took off at an unreal speed and completely disappeared. i was completely shocked. this only lasted 30 seconds or so and my friend and i had not said a word to each other. after it disappeared i asked my friend if he had seen that? he said " you mean that star light that started and stopped moving  several times,changing directions each time then disappearing?" i said yes, and i'm glad you saw that too. we never really talked about it after that night. since then he moved away and i lost contact with him. i do not know what it was but there is no way it was a shooting star. it was the same color,size and brightness of a star and the light never changed color or got brighter or dimmer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like light changing several directions suddenly ,then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Camping 5 miles west i-80 on the west side of cedar mountain over looking valley towards knols sand dunes, at dusk i was falling asleep in my truck, a very bright yellow/orange light lit up the ground around me. then i felt forced into a sleep. i thought this light is coming from above me rather from
the ground. no sound then sleep, no dreams
content.summary: Camping at dusk falling asleep, very bright light over truck trying to fight off sleep that all

content.detailedDescription: It was new year's eve 2014 when some of the neighbors were shooting off fireworks at midnight. my son and i went outside to see what was going on and noticed two very strange fireballs cruising through the sky from the sw heading ene. they were about a mile apart and i honestly believed they were some type of cruise missiles and had gotten very nervous. not more than five minutes later we saw two more coming out of the sw again passing in almost the same direction. i called my wife and my son's girlfriend to see this and they were also very nervous to see these fireballs cruising by as well. my wife wanted to call police about the sightings. then we saw three more coming in a group flying, about a mile or two apart, the same route and then we saw a larger group of four of these fireballs flying lower and coming from a different area all following each other in a line out of the west heading north east. a total of 11 was seen that night by us. i can't believe i am not hearing from others about these objects, or the local news. i did take a video with my iphone6 plus but not great. what did i see?????
content.summary: Saw 11 different fireballs cruising through the sky, no sound very bright

content.detailedDescription: The object approached while i was standing looking out over the lake in the moonlit darkness. the moon was about 3/4 full.  the object came directly toward the pier i was standing on without slowing, seemingly at about the speed of small private plane.  the first thing i noticed and why i took my cell phone out to shoot the shot was the dead silence.  there was a slight wind off the lake but nothing to mask any noise being emitted from the object.  the object flew right over and i took the shot as it was starting away, headed north.  then, all of sudden it dipped a bit and circled once overhead. that scared me.  like it was taking in being taken in.  i did not take another shot until it was almost out of sight (three more, but hey are not distinctive, it being so dark).  the object banked and headed slowly east at about the same speed which i guess to be about a hundred miles per hour, maybe a little more.  that was it.  unnerving, to say the least.
content.summary: Pointed object with a forward tubular fuselage extending out thirty feed from the triangular main body with two small 'wings' sticking about ten feet out from mid-fuselage, the triangle house the three lights near corners were about fifteen feet esc

content.detailedDescription: Out side waiting for  fire works,for the new year to start. the bject was hudge and i aked y girlfriend if she sees it and she said yes, it was not at first oveing at all then started to mmove very slow i at first thought it might be and air plane, but a it got closer their was no noise at all and it for sure wa nothing we ever seeen, then it stoped with pulsateing lights around it and their was a sort of like light aluminateing out from it like i guess a arrow then it dissapeared,  and then seen it again sought of us aways away but this time it was all with all white lights, tried take pictures of it but would not or could not see on camera so i went inside to get my binocklers,and focued in on it and it was totally different then looking with with out the,it seemed to be moveing around in all different directions very weird and it slowely faded away into and orb and dissappeared and thats it thanks
content.summary: Very strange unkowen sighting

content.detailedDescription: It was shortly after midnight, and i went outside to have a cigarette. slightly above eye level i saw a bright orange, circular light traveling north. there is a lot of air traffic here, but the light was not white, nor were there other lights (red, green as expected). the light was constant, and i heard no sound.. i had seen this same thing about 3-4 weeks ago, and since it was unexplainable to me, i called it a "ufo". when i told someone about the sighting they asked if it could possibly be one of those chinese lanterns. i hadn't thought of that possibility, so couldn't rule it out. this time i consciously considered that. the pathway was the same, but one problem with that theory was that i live about 120 feet from the river, which is only about 1/4 mile from the long island sound, so it is usually windy here, and comes from the north, traveling south. not always, but the vast majority of the time. i can't recall the wind direction from the 1st sighting, and last night we actually had one of those winds that changed directions,so i'm unsure the effects. what made last nights' sighting even more interesting is that after a second or two a 2nd orange light appeared to be following it at a slightly different elevation. it seemed to catch up to it reaching the same level, and got behind it, because i only saw one light for a spit second. the light was either stationary at that point, or had changed direction, traveling west, where i was standing, facing east. at that point i saw another light coming from the south, followed shortly by 2 others, totaling 5!!! they were identical lights, and in very close proximity to each other. i want to add that from my vantage point there is a house across the street(ese), and a house behind that which is further north. the lights came into my view from behind the house across the street, and over the roof of the house behind that. when all 5 lights were in sight, they seemed to just stop there for at least a couple of minutes. then the lights would just blink off one at a time, randomly. i then called my daughter to tell her, and after about a minute into the conversation, the 1st (or at least most northerly) light blinked back on! the trees were hampering my view, so i walked down my driveway to the road, and by that time the light blinked off again. i forgot to mention that i had grabbed my binoculars by front door within the 1st minute of this sighting, but they're not the best, and the light was the same bright orange, just smaller. no other features were visible. my daughter had suggested getting my camera, but i didn't want to miss anything. i will now keep that by the front door as well. i am quite curious if anyone else has reported the same, and especially if anyone knows what these lights are? thank you!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 5 bright orange lights traveling north, then stopped for a few minutes, then blinked out.

content.detailedDescription:
Despite the fact i was at a new years party, i was standing outside with two of my friends who were smoking cigarettes. i was looking up at the sky like i always do in hope that maybe i'll see something usual, but figured it would be like all the other times and not see anything.


at first this is what i saw before trying to process any of this. 
it was 4 bird shaped objects in a straight line pointing to my left, separated in between  by bits of the sky, the center of the objects were just white, but towards the edges it would get softer as if they had a glow around them. yet, you could see completely the outline of the objects. it appeared to my right then quickly moved to my left then suddenly gone. 

now, i've been to this place so many times, looked up at the same sky, seen spot lights, seen air planes, seen helicopters and every single time i could hear the roaring over the music or there would be red or green blinking lights but never moved this fast. the spot lights shoot way too low and are way too big for the size of the objects i saw and not even come close to how vibrant they were, plus there were absolutely no clouds in the sky. now, i've told myself, always be a skeptic before claiming anything, try weighing out all potential possibilities. now my first response was, the spot lights were reflecting off of birds flying in the sky, but that couldn't explain the speed they were traveling at. i give myself the benefit of the doubt and say, they weren't traveling as fast as i might think they were, but still giving myself that from the time they appeared and disappeared it was 10 seconds at the most. honestly, part of me says it was a shorter time span than that. i can still see what i saw in the sky perfectly in my head and thinking about the sizing, i could fit at least two objects within a penny with the space still in between them.  there was no colored lights, none blinking, just a glow around the edges. 

when i got home it came across my mind and i tired looking up similar sightings, which brought me to this site. as filling out this whole thing, it made me think about the whole situation in more detail. they could of been triangles such as < < < <  (the spacing in between is actually on point with what i saw) 
but white in the center and the white glow around each separate object.  

now honestly, by submitting this, i am hoping someone responds back giving me a logical answer to this whole situation. i want someone to prove me wrong.
content.summary: Four bird shapedobjects glowing white moving from right to left across the sky until out of site no more than 10 seconds before gone

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on interstate 25  just outside of santa fe new mexico when i looked up and saw a bright starlike object in the north east sky.   it was the brightest object in the sky at that time.   it was around 10 pm  i had my passenger use my phone to make a video of the object.   it didnt look like it was moving unless it was coming right at us  but you could see it giving off different colors.   after the video was made  i continued traveling for another hour or so.   as i was heading east on highway 120  around 12 pm  my passenger looked up and now saw two bright objects in the sky  in the same general area  at about this time there were two bright flashes of a greenish color light to my left in the northern sky which lit up the whole area there was no explosion or noise of any kind    my passenger then noticed an object with a red light heading towards the area where the two bright object were  and there was only one left.  as the red light approached the bright object it seemed to change direction to go around it and it soon disappeared.  when i arrived home about 30 minutes later  i searched the sky before i went in the house and could no longer find the bright object   i have a video that was taken while we were driving just outside of santa fe  but it is too large to download off of my phone
content.summary: I was driving from santa fe nm   to roy nm  i looked up and saw a starlike object

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i saw the light after going outside to look at the moon. we saw two light together flying fast across the sky. we then went to the front of our house and walked down the street where we saw a single light and then 3 more lights!
content.summary: 6 lights in groups of 2 and 1

content.detailedDescription: On the spring afternoon after a spring rain fall. i looked out my kitchen window and there was a double rainbow. it was very pretty so i decided to take a picture of it with my cellphone. i took the first picture. i realized i wasn't going to be able to get both rainbows in the picture without going  outside. so i did go outside and got the picture i wanted. when i went back and looked at the pictures i noticed in the first picture taken indoors there were two flying orbs in the picture. fyi i knew what there were because i had an close encounter with one as a child. the one when i was a child happened in pittsburgh p.A. in the 170's and the orb came from orions belt.
content.summary: I took a picture of a double rainbow and in the picture there is two flying light orbs flying next to each other.

content.detailedDescription:
Arriving at home at 0130 est.
looked up as walking in house and immediately noticed fireball in sky.
aircraft.
moved erratically , was like reddish or orange fireball , exhibiting wobbling motion and was not an aircraft !
it was an interesting sighting.
it picked up speed as it moved into the clouds and we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Observed fire ball in sky looking wsw at 240 degree heading at 30 degrees elevation

content.detailedDescription: Traveling by plane to islip, ny from austin, tx. changed planes in nashville, tn. plane flew over atlantic ocean i believe to be off the coast of virginia. sky was blue w/white clouds, noticed in the middle of all the blue & white a black oval cloud, which seemed out of place since everything else was blue sky and white clouds. kept observing cloud for a couple of minutes when suddenly it seemed to turn and change into the shape of a helicopter, still in a cloud like state, all fuzzy with no definite edges. i could see the top props, the body of a copter & landing skis the suddenly it turned again & was back in the shape of an oval black cloud & at that time it appeared to fire a silver type projectile from it. i observed this for about 5 to 7 minutes before the plane i could no longer see it. i don't know if it was a ufo or some sort of stealth helicopter or what. i do not know if this is anything ya'll would be interested in, but it feels good to get this off my chest.
content.summary: Black cloud turning into helicoper fired siver projectilbe

content.detailedDescription: My wife had ben watching tv when she went to the kitchen and saw a unique craft flying across the western sky which was vissible threw our kitchen window. my wife immediatley came to tell me that their was a ufo in the sky. the object was now vissible threw a bedroom window that allowed us to see clearly the craft appearing to be the size of a mid-sized car hovering in the north west sky. the experience only lasted long enough to see red & greenish clear lights reverse direction. the the craft decended rapidly with a fire like glow looking like it may land in a near-by park but it was gone at that pioint. my wife and i discussed the sighting for over a week before submitting this report to insure in our own minds that what we saw that night was factual.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object was first observed by my wife and then by me  within a minute

content.detailedDescription: When i first saw the lights my mom and i were on the over pass coming back from the store.At first i just thought it was a really bright star, but when i saw it moving i thought it was a plane. it wasn't  until a bunch of little lights started appearing  around it that i thought it was strange enough to mention it to my mom. we ended up pulling over in a parking lot to watch it. we couldn't  believe that no one else was pulling over to do the same. as we sat there watching it we saw that it would start out about the size of a baseball and then it would grow about to the size of a basketball, maybe even a little bigger. then when it was at its biggest   it would stay that size and all these little smaller lights would appear  around it one at a time. then with the smaller lights still around it two lights would come out of the middle one and circle around it really fast then go back into the middle one. then the little lights would disappear  one by one until the middle one was left and then it would get smaller and smaller untill you couldn't see it. after that it would appear a little farther away to the west and repeat the actions that it did before until it got to far away to see it over the trees. my mom decided to take the back way home since it would take us the direction it had gone. we got to a spot where we had clear view of the west and it was really close to a tower near north view  hill. when it got closer it started circling  the tower and after it circled a few times it started moving towards spri2ngfield. that's when mom decided to get home so that we could call my dad who was working in springfield. but by the time we got hold of him and he went outside it was gone out of sight.
content.summary: My mom and i saw lights moving towards the west that were acting very weird

content.detailedDescription: i was driving back into town from my ranch when i noticed a bright white light in my side view mirror.   there were no other vehicles on the road  i pulled over and got out of my truck and saw a large white object in the sky.   the sun had just set    and there was no moon out that night   i took a picture and continued driving back into town    about 10 minutes later i was back home  and looked up in the same direction and nothing was there
content.summary: I was driving on a county road with no other vehicles around when i noticed a bright white light  in my mirror

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time i have captured in my iphone a ufo watching the fireworks, what is there fascination with them? i was downtown in new years eve recording the firework display when this orb craft came forward hovering over the crowed, it moved back and forth and up and down. i seen this same craft last year when on fourth if july when the fireworks were going off at the lake, i uploaded that video in my youtube site,
content.summary: New years eve we were down town watching the fireworks when this strange shape came hovering over the crowed it flickered red and green lights and maneuvered around hovering in weird formations.

content.detailedDescription: I saw three balls of stationary light that rotated counter clockwise, then after a few minutes it shot straight up out of sight.
content.summary: Object was stationary but rotated counter clockwise i have photos

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my grandparents farm with my uncle mother 2 brothers and sister going for a walk just after dusk 
when suddenly this round disc shape appeared above us with bright pulsating lights 
yellow, blues, greens, oranges, reds & bright white in the center
my uncle stated there is the government again 
i immediately got excited then felt scared and i froze 
i saw up into the bottom of the object
then i woke up the next day at home
this happened in the mid 1970's and when i ask my sister mother and brothers about
the incident they don't remember anything
but when i recently asked my uncle about it he remembers exactly what i remembered
and losing track of time
this has been on my mind since i was approximately 6 or 7 
years old 
now i'm 43
i still can't get that image out of my head 
i'm glad i have some place to let someone else know
my uncle described they same thing i saw and we never spoke of it again
content.summary: Round disc shape    no sound  pulsating different lights and a spinning object of white light in the center toward the bottom of the propulsion system

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a sighting. i have artifacts that show the beings that were once here and they have been all over the solar system. i can prove tthis. my items show the beings and writings that are not from this planet. there are pictures of mars,moons of earth and jupiter that nasa took with their equipment. i have pictures of them and they are amazing!!! 

i have written a few agencies and i am waithing for response from them. 

this is the proof that would solve the question of other beings in our universe. 

please take this seriously. i do not want to waste my time.

god be with us.

if you respond i will provide phots that will astound you.
content.summary: This is not a sighting but of objects left behind.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time, we were taking off from lajes field, azores on 28 december 2014, at 1400, azores time. lajes is on the island of terceira and is the second island from east to west of 9 total. we were flying on a 757 cargo/passenger plane. i sat in the back part of the plane, behind the right wing in seat 3f.  we had just taken off and were about 7 - 10 minutes into our take off to cruising altitude. as i was settling down for the 5 hour trip to the bwi flight terminal, i looked out to my right as we cleared a few clouds and saw a dark trail with no end and a beginning just starting at the 330 position of the plan while flying due nw. it was directly under and to the right of the plane and, at first i thought it was condensation from under the wing but the trail was a dark grey color. i then looked out the window between my seat and the first seat in front of me, then i saw the orb that was shaped as a circle, see thru with a countinual rainbow as the outer rim, with a yellowish glow in the center. i took my droid phone and started to record a video from my window. i then went back to the window in front of mine again to ensure there wasn't a glare that i was recording. i took pictures as i was recording with my phone, but i just got off of holiday with my family so i knew my memory was filling quickly. i stopped after 2 minutes and checked the video to make sure i had recorded something and after going back to my window it was gone, trail and all. i wanted to say something then but i was under a few constraints as we were required to stay seated during take off and i didn't want anyone to think i was crazy. i cant upload the video right now due to its size but im working on getting it a smaller size.
im a sensible person, i just want to know what i've seen.
content.summary: See thru orb.Rainbow circle w/trail

content.detailedDescription:
My son was outside for a smoke about 12:30 am on 1/1/15 and saw two or three orange lights in the sky, flickering like fire in the area of an array of radio towers (which had red lights on them).  at first glance, it appeared the radio towers were taller than he remembered.  on second and third glance, he realized they were not in line with the vertical lights on the towers and realized they were moving.

his observation was that they were moving (at this point, there were definitely three) at what appeared to be a slow speed.  apparently, perspective impacted the first perceived speed because as they got closer, they seemed to be moving faster.

he came in and asked if i wanted to see the weird lights in the sky. i expected it might be fireworks or that he was joking with me. by the time i was out on the porch, there were definitely four of them. what we both at first thought was the top light on the radio towers turned out to be a fifth object of the same description.

the total number of objects seen was five and they passed almost directly overhead. the flicker was more pronounced when they were overhead than it was as they were approaching.

they held their course and did not turn, bob around, or stop.  there was no sound associated with their presence.

the trajectory was more wsw to ene.  they appeared fairly equally spaced from each other, with the last one seeming to lag a bit further behind.

shortly after they passed over us, each one individually disappeared at nearly the same point in the sky.  some just blinked out while at least one appeared to fade out as it moved along.

the sky was completely clear of any clouds and the orion constellation was very clear.  a meteor was observed after the objects disappeared.  there was no discernible wind at the time.

there were no green, white or red lights on these objects as one would expect with a commercial aircraft.

my son's feelings were wonder ~ what were these things?  i walked up to the street to look over the house in the direction where they disappeared and they were nowhere to be seen.

i went back inside to watch tv and couldn't shake the feeling that they were still out there somehow.  this could possibly be related to the fact that they just disappeared and i couldn't know they continued on their path.

i am fascinated at the broomall, pa sighting (on your website) of the same day and approximate time since broomall is a good sixty miles southeast of our location and that report seems to be of the same or similar objects.

i've checked a few local news outlets online and have found nothing similar. i feel others are most likely to have observed this also because people are often outside after midnight on december 31/january 1, so i won't be surprised to learn of other reports.
content.summary: Flame-like color & appearance; 5 objects on same trajectory equally spaced from each other; disappeared near the same spot

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from new years eve party, my wife (who had not had anything to drink) called my attention to a cluster of orange lights in the sky.  we stopped the car and got out to look.  they hovered for a while, then disappeared.  we could clearly see the light from them reflecting off the cloudcover behind them.
content.summary: Cluster of orange lights hovered a few minutes then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Our family room and couch faces south, on saturday nov. 27, 2014  at 8:30pm while sitting on our couch watching tv i see a big solid round  red light over the house behind us. i often see planes on approach to cuyahoga country airport but those are heading east to west and the red aircraft lights are flashing red and much smaller than what i was seeing. i had no idea what these were as i'd never seen anything in the sky lighted this large. i got up and walked to our sliding patio door for  closer look, i then see another one coming approximately 200 yards following the exact same south to north route, i immediately go outside to watch them, as they're almost overhead i look to the south and see three more following the exact same route and spacing, i yell for my wife to come out and she see's the last 3 as they silently went overhead and to the north following the exact same route. i run back inside, grab the phone then go back out and call 911, i explain what i saw and they said they had no reports or explanation. they were always in level flight and i'd guess between 500-2,000 feet in elevation. to approximate the size i'd say if an aircraft  marker light looks the size of a bb these would be the size of a quarter. we watched them all until they went out of sight over the house's and tree's across the street to our north. i'm not saying these were aliens but would love to know what they were, definitely not a plane or helicopter! i'm only sorry that in the excitement of seeing this i never thought to grab my ipod from it's charger to take a video of this.
content.summary: 5 ufo's traveling south to north

content.detailedDescription: We were shooting fireworks and noticed the objects in a triangle formation, thought is was more fireworks glowing in the sky but the objects were to high, the objects hovered for about 2 minutes in the east the the object in front moved quickly to the west and appeared and disappeared several times then the other 2 orbs disappeared as well.
content.summary: 3 orbs hovering for about 2 minutes in triangle formation, then the orb in front moved at least 2 miles in a couple of seconds then all orbs vanished
